source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals
source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.

items.title: Modern Market Research
items.headline: Market research step by step execution, limitations of research, focus groups, projective techniques, sources of data.
objectives_summary: Learn introduction to market research
Important indicators in market research
Learn details about focus group

items.title: A  Review of Skills Needed for Internet Marketing
items.headline: A series of 12 Days from a Facebook Live
objectives_summary: They will have an overview of those skills and software assets needed to run a business on line.

items.title: Consumer Behavior

visible_instructors.name: SPORiT.MatchPoint
visible_instructors.title: SPORiT.MatchPoint Lab
visible_instructors.job_title: Online Career Training in Sports Business

items.headline: Know better about your fans
objectives_summary: Understand the definition of consumer behavior
Understand consumers behave is the aspect of culture
Understand team identification&fan identification

items.title: How To Sell From The Stage
items.headline: Earn from every speaking opportunity
objectives_summary: Learn how to give value to your audience and make sales

items.title: Book Marketing Fundamentals
items.headline: Tell the world about your book
objectives_summary: Over the course of this class, students will learn how to put together a comprehensive marketing plan and how to implement that plan
Why an author platform is so important
How to write your marketing content

items.title: Building and Optimizing a winning Landing page!
items.headline: How to optimize your Landing Pages to raise your conversions,Identify the crucial elements who influences the process
objectives_summary: Realize a winning Landing Page,Squeeze Pages,Sales Pages and how to optimize it
Realize a useful activity of Split Testing knowing it deeply
Learn to capture hot leads and to maximize conversion rate

items.title: Be a 'Specialist' In Key Account Acquisition and Management
items.headline: Relationship & Sales Strategies & Process (Basic)
objectives_summary: Develop the Approach of 'Consultative Selling' as a need of hour post Covid-19 situation
Learn how to grow your sales volumes and Key Account business quickly and effectively specially in the era of 'Post - Covid' situation
Develop strategies for managing “Difficult” and “Demanding” client behaviour in today's time

items.title: Essentials of Marketing Made Easy (Plain Marketing)
items.headline: Market Segmentation - Target Markets - Positioning - Marketing Mix
objectives_summary: 18 Types of Marketing
Marketing Dashboard
The Marketing Environment

items.title: Marketing Skills For Small Businesses
items.headline: Practical marketing skills for small business owners
objectives_summary: You will learn all the basic marketing principles in terms of how to market your small business.
You will learn how to design a product properly to meet the requirements of your target market.
You will learn how to focus your marketing on the different types of generations you are selling to.

items.title: Learn The Internet Marketing lifestyle of Online Marketers
items.headline: Upgrade Today To Become An Expert At Internet Marketing And Get Better Results… Faster Than You Ever Thought Possible!
objectives_summary: ou can work from anywhere, explore the world and potentially make a lot of money without having to work all that many hours.
Ultimately, we’ll see how you can manage your work life balance and protect your health
In this guide, we’re going to take a brief look at some of the health challenges associated with internet marketing

items.title: A to Z Professional Study of Solar Tech Sales Representative
items.headline: Get A to Z Knowledge of Professional Study of Solar Technical Sales Representative from Basics to Advanced
objectives_summary: Learner Should able to understand Roles and Responsibilities of Solar Technical Sales Representative.
Learner Should able to understand Task Analyzation of Solar Project
Learner Should able to understand Criteria to Qualify Customers for Solar Installations.

items.title: Marketing: Using Emotion to Drastically Increase Your Sales

visible_instructors.name: Brian
visible_instructors.title: Brian Sly
visible_instructors.job_title: Content Engagement Strategist at Emblem Media Inc.

items.headline: Become More Strategic, More Targeted, and Reach Tighter Niche Markets Through Emotion-Based Messaging Content
objectives_summary: Learn to narrow their target markets strategically
Design specific customer avatars for better conversions
Craft effective messages to reach their new markets

items.title: Principles of Marketing Practice Tests
items.headline: Testing your knowledge of marketing fundamentals
objectives_summary: Practice with marketing basics

items.title: How Manipulation Works in Marketing/Copywriting
items.headline: The different types of manipulation that marketers and copywriters may use - as well as how to fight them
objectives_summary: The different types of manipulation in marketing and copywriting
Specific examples of how each type of manipulation may be used in marketing or copy
How to protect yourself against each of these types as a prospective buyer/visitor

items.title: Special Topics in PR Ethics
items.headline: Ethics
objectives_summary: Students will be able to explore the ethical issues that can be encountered in public relations, corporate communication and other areas of strategic communications.
Students will be able to develop an understanding of the ethical perspectives, ethical issues, ways of understanding and overcoming the ethical dilemmas.
Students will be able to understand New Media and  Ethics

items.title: Marketing Principles
items.headline: Learn The Principles of Marketing
objectives_summary: Critically analyse and evaluate internal and external marketing environments, and stakeholder and customer relationships in a range of marketing scenarios
Undertake research to understand marketing theories, concepts & techniques for designing marketing & risk management plans in a variety of marketing situations
Design competitive positioning, branding and marketing strategies for real-world events.
